text: aur unase hisaab lena hamaara kaam hai kya un logon ne ye baat na dekhee ki ham zameen ko (futuhaate islaam se) usake tamaam etaraaph (chaaro or) se (savaah kuphr mein) ghataate chale aate hain aur khuda jo chaahata hai hukm deta hai usake hukm ka koee taalane vaala nahin aur bahut jald hisaab lene vaala hai
